author: Special Correspondent
text:
Ethiraj College for Women on Friday launched a drive to enrol its students as voters. It is part of a drive by the Election Commission to ensure 100 per cent enrolment of students. The college has around 8,000 students.

According to M.B. Pavithra, lecturer, PG Department of Human Rights and Duties Education, the process was launched on Friday. “We have been part of the programme in the past too and this year also we are continuing it ,” she said. The college started an online registration process and 100 students registered on Friday. Since the cut-off date for enrolment is for those born after January 1997, a majority of students in the first year would not be eligible to apply, she added.
title: Ethiraj College launches drive to enrol voters
